name: Alex Malunda
bio: The visionary behind CineWatch, Alex brought his passion for cinema and coding skills from Mlolongo to create a platform for diverse storytelling.

name: Jane Wanjiku
bio: Jane travels across Africa, discovering hidden cinematic gems and negotiating partnerships to bring exclusive content to CineWatch.

name: David Otieno
bio: With a knack for scalable solutions, David ensures CineWatch's infrastructure is robust, fast, and accessible to all our users.

name: Fatma Hassan
bio: Fatma connects CineWatch with its audience, building vibrant communities and spreading the word about our unique content.
